resources.string: The format of the mail does not seem right
Must mix capital and non-capital letters, a number, special character and a minimum length of 8
Don`t worry! It happens. Please enter the address associated with your account
You\'re almost ready to start enjoying FutureMe. Please verify your email address and click the confirmation link.
In case you don\'t find the link in inbox, please check the spam folder.
Your email is not confirmed. Another email confirmation has been sent.

Q: What does the FutureMe App do?
A: This App allows you to write a letter to future self. Write a letter, select a photo, enter email address and date to receive the letter. The letter will be sent to your selected email address on the selected date.

Q: Why I didn't receive my letter on the selected date?
A:There are several possible reasons:
- Wrong email address.
- The letter goes to your email's spam folder.
- We have reached a daily limit to send letters. Your letter may send to you earlier or later depends on the available slot.

Q: Is it free to send letters?
A: Yes, is it free.

Q: Who can I contact if I need an assistant?
A: You may contact us at alinateca2001@gmail.com.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?\nAll your future letters will also be deleted!
You are not connected to the internet. Make sure Wi-Fi or Mobile Data is on and Airplane Mode is off.
There is no letter to show for now
What is your message for future?
